other_tests.findings: Thickening of the nasopharyngeal mucosa and abnormal signals on the right side at the base of the tongue, with unclear cause.
Mucosa connected the anterior pillars, the base of the tongue, and the soft palate, creating a narrow, circular oropharyngeal opening of 0.5 cm in diameter.
other_tests.changes_over_time: Postoperatively, the patient had a satisfactory result.
